svg.text: AI-Enhanced Security Assessment in Intelligent Code Review

g.text: • OWASP Top 10 Detection • Dependency Vulnerability Scanning • Configuration Security
• SQL Injection Analysis • XSS Prevention • Authentication Validation
• Business Logic Security • Architectural Consistency • Data Flow Analysis
• Access Control Validation • Encryption Implementation • Threat Modeling
• Expert Security Reviewer Assignment • High-Risk Change Escalation
• Compliance Specialist Consultation • Security Architecture Review
• Proactive Security: Threats detected before deployment
• Learning Acceleration: Security expertise shared across team
• Compliance Automation: Regulatory requirements automatically enforced
Result: 400% improvement in security posture with 60% less effort

svg.title: Review Security Integration Framework - Intelligent Review with AI-Enhanced Security Assessment
svg.desc: Comprehensive framework showing how intelligent review integrates automated security scanning, threat detection, compliance validation, and risk assessment to create a proactive security posture in code review processes.
